'''John A. Neris'''  ([[28 November|28 November]], [[1932]] - [[16 January|January 16]], [[1995]]) was a U.S. actor who provided the rotoscope on-set performance for [[Gandalf]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|The Lord of the Rings]]''.
